Posts.Content: I was just diagnosed with a recurrence of my breast cancer and like you it only been 2 1/2 years and I had chemo and radiation. Know I have bone met. It is very scary I still can't believe this is happening to me. I will begin radiation next week and infusion Friday. It hard to believe you have go through this all over again. But I want you to try and stay strong and try get your strenght from others. Good luck and God Bless
Posts.Title: BC reoccurence

Posts.Content: Good luck with your new doctor he sound like a well expreience doctor. I hope and pray everything goes well for you. barbara
Posts.Title: Update on my reoccurence

Posts.Content: I will keep positive thought about you and make sure you are in my prayer. I am so sorry that you have to fight this monster again. We all have your back with positive engery and prayer. Lots of Hugs Barbara

Posts.Content: I will keep positive thought about you and make sure you are in my prayer. I am so sorry that you have to fight this monster again. We all have your back with positive engery and prayer. Lots of Hugs Barbara

Posts.Title: Just when I thought it was safe to go back in the water, I was bitten by Jaws! So to speak...

Posts.Content: Hi everyone, Just giving you a little update. I have been in so much pain my doctor decided to take me off of zometa and go to new treatment. I do not know what kind until after I have stereotactic spine radiosurgery to my T6. This is a high radiation that beam directly at my T6 tumor that will not effect any other spot. I have that done the end of Aug. This treatment suppose to help relieve the pain so wish me luck. Thank you for thinking about me. I feel like I have second family that truly understand how I feel and I am blessed to call u all my sisters. Big Cyber Hugs Barbara
Posts.Title: Update BJmom

Posts.Content: I start taking tamiofen in 2008 had to many joints pain was switch to arimdex 2009 it stop working for me. I was diagnosis in 2010 and was swicth to aromasin with zometa for bone met in my T6. I did not have the pleasure of being NED for 5 years. But I am still here fighting. Barb
Posts.Title: reoccurance question

Posts.Content: Hello Everybody, It been along time since I was on line a lot of things happen some good and bad. First let me start out with the good. I just came back from disney world this was on my bucket list to see my 5 year old son have fun at disney. So that was my high light so far. Next the bad news my bone cancer ave gotten bigger so now I have to start a new chemo and my xeloda is making my hand and feet burn and peel. Next I have bladder problems because of bone mets because it causing pressure to the spine. I going to have a pet scan to see if it had spread to my liver just pray it haven't because I just got my lungs clear since I found out I have lung mets also. Whether then that I have gotten things done that is important to me. I pray try to keep a positive attitude and lord know that hard. Well that all for now getting trier again need to rest up for the next challange. Cyber Hugs Barbara
Posts.Title: Update on Bjmom1

Posts.Content: Hi Everyone, Thanks for thinking about me. I have had a couple terrible months for me. I was in the hospital the first week of November found out I had gallstone. Then my son was sick for a week then the following week the whole family had the stomach virus. No one couldn't tell me I was full of sh###.(LOL) I was still feeling sick from the gallstone and found I out that my friend who was 43yr old passes from met breast. And one of the 20years survivor pass away that same week so I have been feeling depress about that. I just had my gallbladder remove this Monday and still feel like crap the doctor said it well take a couple of weeks to feel better I hope so because I am tried of not eating food due to stomach ache. But whether then that I am happy I'm still here and fighting against this disease. Thank once again for thinking about me here a Big Cyber Hugs. Barb
Posts.Title: update on BJMOM

Posts.Content: JoJo, I am so sorry for your loss you been through alot and I just want to seen you a Big Hug and Kiss. I will keep you and your family in my prayers. Barbara
Posts.Title: Im devastated....need prayers!!!!

Posts.Content: Hi Lorrie, To keep me going is a song by Yolanda Adams. The battle is not your it the Lord. So what I do is give it to him no matter what you going throught remember the battle is not your it the Lord. He only one who can help you get through. Live life think of positive things and let the negative thought go. We all are fearful, but we have to be happy that we was able to wake up and see another day so enjoy that day. I know it hard not to think negative but don't stay there give that negative thought to Lord. And show him you are happy he gave you another day by doing something positive and believe that he will help you fight this battle. Remember whatever you do to help fight this disease God is with you ever step of the way. God Bless you Huggs from your BC sister Barbara
Posts.Title: Kathi, Meena, Bj and Chen are like the captains of the football team

Posts.Content: JoJo, I am so sorry for your loss you been through alot and I just want to seen you a Big Hug and Kiss. I will keep you and your family in my prayers. Barbara
